raw: * This interface defines a data structure compatible with the data binding
* controllers.
* It defines a minimum of functionality which the controller need to work.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: This interface defines a data structure compatible with the data binding controllers. It defines a minimum of functionality which the controller need to work.

raw: * The change event which will be fired if there is a change in the data structure.
* The data contains a map with three key value pairs:

*
  • start: The start index of the change.

*
  • end: The end index of the change.
* <li>type: The type of the change as a String. This can be 'add',
* 'remove', 'order' or 'add/remove'

*
  • added: The items which has been added (as a JavaScript array)

*
  • removed: The items which has been removed (as a JavaScript array)

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
The change event which will be fired if there is a change in the data structure. The data contains a map with three key value pairs:

  • start: The start index of the change.
  • end: The end index of the change.
  • type: The type of the change as a String. This can be 'add', 'remove', 'order' or 'add/remove'
  • added: The items which has been added (as a JavaScript array)
  • removed: The items which has been removed (as a JavaScript array)

raw: * The changeLength event will be fired every time the length of the
* data structure changes.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The changeLength event will be fired every time the length of the data structure changes.

raw: * Returns the item at the given index
* @param index {Number} The index requested of the data element.
* @return {var} The element at the given index.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the item at the given index

@param.name: @param
@param.body: index {Number} The index requested of the data element.
@param.description: The index requested of the data element.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {var} The element at the given index.
@return.description: The element at the given index.

raw: * Sets the given item at the given position in the data structure. A
* change event has to be fired.
* @param index {Number} The index of the data element.
* @param item {var} The new item to set.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the given item at the given position in the data structure. A change event has to be fired.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: index {Number} The index of the data element.
@param.description: The index of the data element.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: item {var} The new item to set.

raw: * Method to remove and add new element to the data. For every remove or
* add a change event should be fired.
* @param startIndex {Integer} The index where the splice should start
* @param amount {Integer} Defines number of element which will be removed
*   at the given position.
* @param varargs {var} All following parameters will be added at the given
*   position to the array.
* @return {qx.data.Array} An array containing the removed elements.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Method to remove and add new element to the data. For every remove or add a change event should be fired.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: startIndex {Integer} The index where the splice should start
@param.description: The index where the splice should start

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
amount {Integer} Defines number of element which will be removed
   at the given position.
@param.description:
Defines number of element which will be removed
   at the given position.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
varargs {var} All following parameters will be added at the given
   position to the array.
@param.description:
All following parameters will be added at the given
   position to the array.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {qx.data.Array} An array containing the removed elements.
@return.description: An array containing the removed elements.

raw: * Check if the given item is in the current data structure.
* @param item {var} The item which is possibly in the data structure.
* @return {Boolean} true, if the array contains the given item.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Check if the given item is in the current data structure.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: item {var} The item which is possibly in the data structure.
@param.description: The item which is possibly in the data structure.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Boolean} true, if the array contains the given item.
@return.description: true, if the array contains the given item.

raw: * Returns the current length of the data structure.
* @return {Number} The current length of the data structure.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the current length of the data structure.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Number} The current length of the data structure.
@return.description: The current length of the data structure.

raw: * Returns the list data as native array.
* @return {Array} The native array.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the list data as native array.
